post.text: Live from San Diego: Watch as Hillary speaks on smart foreign policy, keeping our country safe, and why we can't afford Trump as Commander-in-Chief.

comment.author: Dylan
comment.text: No wonder Hillary is spending so much on her Campaign - just look at all the people right here she must of paid to comment . Because I know for a fact there is not that many stupid people in America .

replies.author: Drew
replies.text: Stupid is a vote for Trump!

replies.author: Sarah
replies.text: Please the only people being paid is the Trump invasion on this page

replies.author: Ethan
replies.text: Dylan they are the smart ones.
